mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, context_json, total_chars, create_time, update_time FROM chat_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_history (user_id, context_json, total_chars, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contextJson}, #{totalChars}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_history SET context_json = #{contextJson}, total_chars = #{totalChars}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
